name: Findbar on Top Right
description: For Firefox 25 and newer only. See Notes below for compatibility with other similar user styles.

user.name: LouCypher
user.about:
Mozillian • Firefox extensions, user scripts and user styles author.
Forum profile
forum.userstyles.org/profile/LouCypher

additional_info:
Works with
  • style 93173
  • style 93179
  • style 22286
Won't work with
  • style 90520 — Findbar moves to Add-on Bar. It won't event appear if you hide the Add-on Bar.
  • style 92719 — Findbar moves further to top.
  • All findbar user styles that are not designed for Firefox 25+

discussions.name: Awesome; If you want firefox to act and look more like chrome!
